title: Sea Dogs: To Each His Own – v1.7.0 + All DLCs
body:
Sea Dogs: To Each His Own – v1.7.0 + All DLCs


Genres/Tags: RPG, Pirate/Privateer, Third-person, 3D
Companies: BlackMark Studio, Akella
Languages: RUS/ENG
Original Size: 18.2 GB
Repack Size: from 2.7 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT – [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: Google Drive (Uploaded by hermietkreeft)
  • Filehoster: Google Drive + 3 hosters (Uploaded by LaRoyal, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Sea.Dogs.To.Each.His.Own.Happily.Ever.After-PLAZA release: plaza-sea.dogs.to.each.his.own.happily.ever.after.iso (6,771,212,288 bytes)
  • Russian release (11.9 GB) has been added as an option
  • Game version: v1.7.0, all five DLCs are included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you can skip downloading and installing of either English or Russian localization
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 18.2 to 2.7~3.1 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 3-8 minutes (depending on your system and selected language)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 12 GB
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

1654 AC. The Caribbean. A place of opportunities and mysteries. Take a role of Charles de Maure – a young French noble who arrived to the New World to assist his brother. What seemed to be a simple family matter, turned into a lifelong adventure. This is a story of the noble idler who became the most powerful man of the Caribbean. Riches, titles, power, romance – the ultimate booty awaits, it is up to you how to get it all. Become a pirate and terrorize the archipelago, take prizes in the sea and plunder cities. Or try to keep hands mostly clean – trade both goods and information, work for the state and help the folk. Get a ship, arm yourself, gather a crew of your dream and find love. The New World is way too vast, too dangerous to explore it alone and there are always consequences for the choices you make!

Included DLCs

  • The Caleuche
  • The Final Lesson
  • Flying the Jolly Roger
  • Hero of the Nation
  • Happily Ever After
